resources.string: This hotel has an outdoor pool and is located in a quiet area of Santa Marta, just 3 km from Simón Bolívar airport and 8 km from El Rodadero beach.
In this magical restaurant you will find a variety of flavors that will make your palate have an explosion of flavors, we have dishes from 13,900 for you and your whole family.
We have dream landscapes, where you can watch the sunset and create wonderful moments with your loved ones.
